achievements: Won a Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Lead Actor in a Drama Series for his role as Nicholas Brody in Homeland
Known for roles in Band of Brothers, Romeo + Juliet, and Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
One of the Young British Artists (YBAs) who dominated the art scene in the 1990s
Known for controversial works like The Physical Impossibility of Death in the Mind of Someone Living (a shark preserved in formaldehyde)
